func.title: DrawMap

param.name: x
param.desc: Left border of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: y
param.desc: Top border of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: width
param.desc: Width of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: height
param.desc: Height of the rectangle in which to draw the map.

param.name: map
param.desc: Definition of the dynamic map. The enclosing map { ... } tag must be present.

func.desc: Draws a dynamic map within the specified rectangle over the old landscape. This is done using the same evaluation as with Landscape.txt components.
func.remark: As maximum string length in C4Script is limited by internal buffers you should use DrawDefMap for very complex maps.

example.text: Fills the top half of the map with earth.
